summary: Reads two image files "buf0.png" and "buf1.png", applies brightness adjustment function btight, then plots the result using dplot function.

details.comment: Reads two image files "buf0.png" and "buf1.png", applies brightness adjustment function btight, then plots the result using dplot function.
details.content:
from measure_console import btight, dplot
import cv2
imageA = cv2.imread("buf0.png")
imageB = cv2.imread("buf1.png")
crx = btight(imageA,imageB)
dplot(crx)
